nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure that converting this to a URI and subsequently calling toString again is a good tradeoff.
You may want to replace the literal "java:/Objects/" by a concatenation from URIHelperConstants, though.
Since buildURI is only used from within this class, it could also be an option to overhaul the flow and do something based on Class.forName instead or even keep an immutable list of the 2x6 allowed combinations such that we can return the URI in constant time without any string / URI manipulation.

it could also be an option to overhaul the flow and do something based on Class.forName instead

Could you please elaborate?

even keep an immutable list of the 2x6 allowed combinations such that we can return the URI in constant time without any string / URI manipulation.

@szarnekow Updated the code. The method buildUri returns a URI in constant time.
You may want to use this classURIHelper in computeTypeUri, too.
